lead_paragraph: Scottish champions Celtic stayed firmly on course to clinch a sixth successive league title and 48th overall after coming from behind to beat arch-rivals Rangers 2-1 in an entertaining Old Firm derby on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Celtic Fight Back to Beat Rangers 2-1 in Old Firm Derby
headline.main: Celtic Fight Back to Beat Rangers 2-1 in Old Firm Derby

snippet: Scottish champions Celtic stayed firmly on course to clinch a sixth successive league title and 48th overall after coming from behind to beat arch-rivals Rangers 2-1 in an entertaining Old Firm derby on Saturday....
